c0446a825514ea0279b8c22f633f2c4e3c73dc1f.commitMessage:
Fix PMD violations from UseVarargs rule, issue #999

The changes are fully backward-compatible. Method with vararg can be invoked both using array and list of parameters.

dfc803a1cc442bafeb5aa375f0d9f0a31d655ff2.commitMessage:
Use Collections.addAll() instead of adding elements individually

As per javadoc, `Collections.addAll()` may be significantly faster than adding elements individually using a for loop.

3c63c31901ca2e6714fe922f695135718198dd06.commitMessage: Changes for patch #3115439 - Added ignoredMethodNames to IllegalThrowsCheck
